content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 3, Valencia 3.
Héctor Moreno (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 3, Valencia 3.
Goal!  Espanyol 3, Valencia 3. Sergio García (Espanyol) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the top right corner. Assisted by Cristhian Stuani with a headed pass.
David Albelda (Valencia) is shown the yellow card.
Kiko Casilla (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by David Albelda (Valencia).
Raúl Rodríguez (Espanyol) is shown the red card.
Goal!  Espanyol 2, Valencia 3. Roberto Soldado (Valencia) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Éver Banega with a through ball.
Offside, Espanyol. Raúl Baena tries a through ball, but Héctor Moreno is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Raúl Baena (Espanyol) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right following a set piece situation.
Foul by João Pereira (Valencia).
Mubarak Wakaso (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Espanyol 2, Valencia 2. Jonas (Valencia) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Roberto Soldado with a headed pass.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Kiko Casilla.
Attempt saved. Roberto Soldado (Valencia) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jonas with a through ball.

Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Diego Colotto.
Attempt saved. Roberto Soldado (Valencia) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Éver Banega with a through ball.
